au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: L1=L2=20m_17p1Alens_prism_offset
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to long position driveDet(19300,300) # Drive guide to lens prism config driveGuide(guideConfig.lp) # Drive entrance aperture to 0 (for lens prism) driveEntRotAp(0) # Drive beamstops up selBs(6)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(41.0, 100) # Drive attenuator to 120 driveAtt(120)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(41.0, 0) driveBsz(240.5)
